flag.name: wxAUI_MGR_ALLOW_FLOATING
flag.description: Allow a pane to be undocked to take the form of a wxMiniFrame.

flag.name: wxAUI_MGR_ALLOW_ACTIVE_PANE
flag.description: Change the color of the title bar of the pane when it is activated.

flag.name: wxAUI_MGR_TRANSPARENT_DRAG
flag.description: Make the pane transparent during its movement.

flag.name: wxAUI_MGR_TRANSPARENT_HINT
flag.description: The possible location for docking is indicated by a translucent area.

flag.name: wxAUI_MGR_VENETIAN_BLINDS_HINT
flag.description: The possible location for docking is indicated by gradually appearing partially transparent hint.

flag.name: wxAUI_MGR_RECTANGLE_HINT
flag.description: The possible location for docking is indicated by a rectangular outline.

flag.name: wxAUI_MGR_HINT_FADE
flag.description: The translucent area where the pane could be docked appears gradually.

flag.name: wxAUI_MGR_NO_VENETIAN_BLINDS_FADE
flag.description: Used in complement of wxAUI_MGR_VENETIAN_BLINDS_HINT to show the docking hint immediately.

flag.name: wxAUI_MGR_LIVE_RESIZE
flag.description: When a docked pane is resized, its content is refreshed in live (instead of moving the border alone and refreshing the content at the end).

flag.name: wxAUI_MGR_DEFAULT
flag.description: Default behavior, combines: wxAUI_MGR_ALLOW_FLOATING | wxAUI_MGR_TRANSPARENT_HINT | wxAUI_MGR_HINT_FADE | wxAUI_MGR_NO_VENETIAN_BLINDS_FADE.

type.name: EVT_AUI_PANE_BUTTON
type.description: Triggered when any button is pressed for any docked panes.

type.name: EVT_AUI_PANE_CLOSE
type.description: Triggered when a docked or floating pane is closed.

type.name: EVT_AUI_PANE_MAXIMIZE
type.description: Triggered when a pane is maximized.

type.name: EVT_AUI_PANE_RESTORE
type.description: Triggered when a pane is restored.

type.name: EVT_AUI_RENDER
type.description: This event can be caught to override the default renderer in order to custom draw your wxAuiManager window (not recommended).
